short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For macOS. Fix visual color artifacts in full-screen videos when the f.lux app is running. Not associated with the makers of f.lux.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is for macOS users who experience visual artifacts when watching full-screen videos with the f.lux app installed. It helps to correct the appearance of those videos. Works with most video sites, such as YouTube, Netflix, Vimeo and DailyMotion.
